fields.name: Human
fields.description: Versatile but without inherent supernatural abilities.

fields.name: Rock Human
fields.description: Resilient stone-like beings with natural stealth.

fields.name: Vampire
fields.description: Immortal predators vulnerable to sunlight and Hamon.

fields.name: Pillar Man
fields.description: Evolved ancients with heightened physicality and intelligence.

fields.name: Gray Matter
fields.description: Extraterrestrials adept at mimicry and shapeshifting.

fields.name: Haunting
fields.description: Partially spectral entities existing between life and death.

fields.name: Oracle
fields.description: Seers attuned deeply to the supernatural.
